Thank you for your feedback. We've noticed some comments about missing content in our videos. Just to clarify, our videos strictly adhere to the syllabus for Cambridge IGCSE Biology paper 0610. This information is clearly indicated in each video thumbnail and description.   If you feel any area is 'missing', please compare the syllabus of your specific paper against the one our videos follow.   You can find the syllabus booklet for IGCSE Biology Paper 0610 for the years 2023-2025 on the Cambridge International website:  https://www.cambridgeinternational.org/programmes-and-qualifications/cambridge-igcse-biology-0610/   For your convenience, you can also check your paper's syllabus here:   https://www.cambridgeinternational.org/programmes-and-qualifications/cambridge-upper-secondary/cambridge-igcse/subjects/#  Thank you for your understanding!
